streamlineBusinessManagment.title: Streamline your business management
streamlineBusinessManagment.description: We optimize your resources by simplifying the way you receive orders.

endAbusiveCommissions.title: End abusive commissions
endAbusiveCommissions.description: Forget about intermediaries and sales commissions. You will be able to offer a better price with your independent store.

talkClientWithoutIntermediaries.title: Talk to your clients without intermediaries.
talkClientWithoutIntermediaries.description: Provide better service and attention thanks to direct communication.

avoidCrowdsPremises.title: Avoid crowds in your premises
avoidCrowdsPremises.description: Reduce waiting times and get rid of unnecessary lines by selling online.

saveTimeMoney.description: Ahorrá tiempo y dinero con tu tienda pency

publishCatalogOnline.description: Publicá tu catálogo online y recibí por Whatsapp los pedidos de tus clientes ¡GRATIS!
